title: World Series Heads to a Winner-Take-All Game 7
text:
HOUSTON—In an otherwise sleepy World Series that appeared destined to travel a rather uneventful road to a Houston Astros championship, a much-needed dose of chaos broke out in Game 6. A controversial call resulted in the first managerial ejection in the Fall Classic in 23 years, with the umpires going to replay review to discuss a dispute they couldn’t legally use replay review to settle and a nationwide parsing of the cryptic language that comprises Major League Baseball Rule 5.09 (a)(11) (and the equally confusing comment underneath it).

In...
description: The World Series will come down to Max Scherzer versus Zack Greinke in a decisive Game 7.
